text:
Hello Everyone,can i retrieve marketing form fields value after submit into the HubSpot?
i used embed code script for form integration in my site. I wanna retrieve form data after submit in the HubSpot.

Hi
Has anyone managed to use HubSpot forms, previous form submissions or list membership as a paywall for accessing content on a non-HubSpot site?
hi <@UJW404KBQ> this was created exactly for that (works outside of HS cms) <https://www.depositfix.com/membership>

Reminding everyone that we're closing our Developer NPS survey very soon! This is your chance to share feedback in a place that will be viewed across HubSpot. Don't miss this chance to impact our developer roadmap!

:sprocket-dance:*<https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/devnps2022>*:sprocket-dance:
